title: Remove some unnecessary type arguments.
body:
Remove some unnecessary type arguments.

This is another CL that comes courtesy of IntelliJ.

And I see at least one call to `Collections.<E>singleton(null)`, which looks like another case in which removing the type argument may save us from having to add `@Nullable` there in the future.

RELNOTES=n/a
author: copybara-service[bot]
